slide.title: Security - Configuration - 2
slide.blurb: The issue: register_globals is still used in many applications and even for developing

list.bullet: Can overwrite not properly initialized variables.

slide.blurb: The solution: Turn off register_globals in development and production environments.

list.bullet: Workarounds could overwrite global variables before PHP 4.4.1 and PHP 5.0.5
Still possible with own importing mechanisms.

slide.blurb: register_globals and magic_quotes will be removen in PHP 6
